entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
